Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Ref, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Date, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Number, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Posted, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Entity AS EntityForFiltering, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.TransactionType, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.BankAccount, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Article, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Counterparty, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.AdvanceHolder, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.AmountReceipt, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.AmountExpense, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Currency, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Comment, DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Type, ENDOFPERIOD(DocumentJournalBankDocuments.Date, Day) AS DateDay FROM DocumentJournal.BankDocuments AS DocumentJournalBankDocuments
